title: Best Buy's Magnolia Anniversary Sale is running this week — save up to $2,000 on TVs, speakers, and more
text:
From now through October 20, 2019, you can get early Black Friday prices on high-end home entertainment electronics at Best Buy.

Best Buy claims that if the prices on select items drop before Black Friday, it'll refund the difference, but only if you're a My Best Buy member.

Luckily, it's free to become a My Best Buy Member at the entry-level membership tier.

We've rounded up 16 of the best deals on TVs, speakers, and more from the Magnolia anniversary sale.

Black Friday is at the end of November, but Best Buy members don't need to wait a month for killer deals.

Best Buy is running an anniversary sale on a number of its higher-end home-entertainment products. If you've been itching to buy gear from the likes of Sony, Samsung, and LG, take a look at some of these discounts, which are likely among the best you'll see this year.

We've rounded up a list of the best deals Magnolia Anniversary Sale deals below. Take a look at our picks, or check out Best Buy's website for more information.
description: Now through Sunday, October 20, you can get Black Friday prices on select items. The sale includes TVs, speakers and more.
